item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-11-13
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• RT: It's true. We are now open in Chestnut Hill, MA! That's two US locations. Come visit! (via @HotelChocolatNA) #
  • RT: Kickstarter - Tigerbuttah: A Hand-Painted All Ages Story Inspired by Golden Books: via @addthis (via @fictfact) #
  • I'm at Starbucks (Newton Centre) (Beacon Street and Centre Street, Newton). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
